mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_transfer_order
shipper , country , code , lbx_no , submit_username , contract_no , out_depot_id , modifier , receiving_address , consignee_username , pack_type , destination , remark , port_loading , merchant_name , topideal_code , create_username , merchant_id , first_lading_bill_no , model , id , pay_rules , bill_weight , invoice_no , create_date , cartons , modify_date , modifier_username , submit_one , in_customer_id , in_depot_name , out_depot_name , submit_time , in_depot_id , creater , in_customer_name , tallying_unit , serve_types , mark , status , is_same_area , depot_schedule_address , depot_schedule_id , po_no , bu_name , bu_id , train_number , standard_case_teu , torr_num , carrier , outDepot_addr , transport , pallet_material , unload_port , in_customs_id , in_customs_code , in_platform_customs , out_customs_id , out_customs_code , out_platform_customs , stock_location_type_id , stock_location_type_name ,
VALUES
TRIM(#{shipper}) , TRIM(#{country}) , TRIM(#{code}) , TRIM(#{lbxNo}) , TRIM(#{submitUsername}) , TRIM(#{contractNo}) , #{outDepotId} , #{modifier} , TRIM(#{receivingAddress}) , TRIM(#{consigneeUsername}) , TRIM(#{packType}) , TRIM(#{destination}) , TRIM(#{remark}) , TRIM(#{portLoading}) , TRIM(#{merchantName}) , TRIM(#{topidealCode}) , TRIM(#{createUsername}) , #{merchantId} , TRIM(#{firstLadingBillNo}) , #{model} , #{id} , TRIM(#{payRules}) , TRIM(#{billWeight}) , TRIM(#{invoiceNo}) , #{createDate} , TRIM(#{cartons}) , #{modifyDate} , TRIM(#{modifierUsername}) , #{submitOne} , #{inCustomerId} , TRIM(#{inDepotName}) , TRIM(#{outDepotName}) , #{submitTime} , #{inDepotId} , #{creater} , TRIM(#{inCustomerName}) , TRIM(#{tallyingUnit}) , TRIM(#{serveTypes}) , TRIM(#{mark}) , TRIM(#{status}) , TRIM(#{isSameArea}) , TRIM(#{depotScheduleAddress}) , #{depotScheduleId} , TRIM(#{poNo}) , #{buName} , #{buId} , #{trainNumber} , #{standardCaseTeu} , #{torrNum} , #{carrier} , #{outdepotAddr} , #{transport} , #{palletMaterial} , #{unloadPort} , #{inCustomsId} , #{inCustomsCode} , #{inPlatformCustoms} , #{outCustomsId} , #{outCustomsCode} , #{outPlatformCustoms} , #{stockLocationTypeId} , #{stockLocationTypeName} ,
mapper.delete:
delete from t_transfer_order where id in
#{id}
mapper.sql: shipper, country, code, lbx_no, submit_username, contract_no, out_depot_id, modifier, receiving_address, consignee_username, pack_type, destination, remark, port_loading, merchant_name, topideal_code, create_username, merchant_id, first_lading_bill_no, model, id, pay_rules, bill_weight, invoice_no, create_date, cartons, modify_date, modifier_username, submit_one, in_customer_id, in_depot_name, out_depot_name, submit_time, in_depot_id, creater, in_customer_name, tallying_unit, serve_types, mark, status, is_same_area, depot_schedule_address, depot_schedule_id, po_no, bu_name, bu_id, train_number, standard_case_teu, torr_num, carrier, outDepot_addr, transport, pallet_material, unload_port, in_customs_id, in_customs_code, in_platform_customs, out_customs_id, out_customs_code, out_platform_customs, stock_location_type_id, stock_location_type_name
mapper.select: select from t_transfer_order order by id desc

select t1.id,t1.transfer_order_id,t1.out_goods_id,t1.out_goods_name, t1.out_goods_no,t1.out_goods_code,t1.in_goods_code,t1.in_goods_name, t1.in_goods_id,t1.in_goods_no,t1.transfer_num,t1.brand_name,t1.cont_no,1.bargainno,t1.in_transfer_num from t_transfer_order_item t1 where t1.transfer_order_id = #{id}

SELECT tt.id,tt.code,tt.out_depot_name,tt.in_depot_name,tt.bu_id, tt.bu_name from (SELECT distinct t.id,t.code,t.out_depot_name,t.in_depot_name,t.bu_id, t.bu_name FROM t_transfer_order t LEFT JOIN t_transfer_order_item ti ON t.id=ti.transfer_order_id ) tt order by tt.id desc

where.trim:
t.merchant_id=#{merchantId} and t.status not in('006','013') and t.code= #{code} and t.bu_id= #{buId} and t.out_depot_id= #{outDepotId} and t.in_depot_id= #{inDepotId} and ti.out_goods_no= #{outGoodsNo} and
DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= #{createDateStart} and
DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= #{createDateEnd} and
t.bu_id in
#{buId}

mapper.select:
select t.id,t.code,t.out_depot_id,t.tallying_unit,i.out_goods_id,i.out_goods_no,i.transfer_num from t_transfer_order t,t_transfer_order_item i where t.id=i.transfer_order_id and t.status='013' and t.id in
#{id}

select from t_transfer_order
shipper= #{shipper} and country= #{country} and code= #{code} and lbx_no= #{lbxNo} and submit_username= #{submitUsername} and contract_no= #{contractNo} and out_depot_id= #{outDepotId} and modifier= #{modifier} and receiving_address= #{receivingAddress} and consignee_username= #{consigneeUsername} and pack_type= #{packType} and destination= #{destination} and remark= #{remark} and port_loading= #{portLoading} and merchant_name= #{merchantName} and topideal_code= #{topidealCode} and create_username= #{createUsername} and merchant_id= #{merchantId} and first_lading_bill_no= #{firstLadingBillNo} and model= #{model} and id= #{id} and pay_rules= #{payRules} and bill_weight= #{billWeight} and invoice_no= #{invoiceNo} and create_date= #{createDate} and cartons= #{cartons} and modify_date= #{modifyDate} and modifier_username= #{modifierUsername} and submit_one= #{submitOne} and in_customer_id= #{inCustomerId} and in_depot_name= #{inDepotName} and out_depot_name= #{outDepotName} and submit_time= #{submitTime} and in_depot_id= #{inDepotId} and creater= #{creater} and in_customer_name= #{inCustomerName} and tallying_unit= #{tallyingUnit} and serve_types= #{serveTypes} and mark= #{mark} and status= #{status} and status!= '006' and is_same_area= #{isSameArea} and depot_schedule_address= #{depotScheduleAddress} and depot_schedule_id= #{depotScheduleId} and po_no=#{poNo} and
date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= #{createDateStart} and
date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= #{createDateEnd} and
bu_id= #{buId} and
bu_id in
#{buId}
order by id desc

SELECT t.id, t.code, t.contract_no, t.out_depot_name, t.in_depot_name, t.status, t.lbx_no, t.creater, t.create_username, t.create_date, t.invoice_no, t.pack_type, t.cartons, t.first_lading_bill_no, t.tallying_unit, t.bu_name, t.transport,t.outDepot_addr, t.carrier, t.torr_num,t.standard_case_teu, t.train_number,t.receiving_address, t.stock_location_type_name FROM t_transfer_order t
order by id desc

SELECT t.code, ti.out_goods_code, ti.out_goods_no, ti.out_goods_name, ti.out_unit, ti.transfer_num, ti.in_goods_code,ti.in_goods_no, ti.in_goods_name, ti.in_unit, ti.in_transfer_num, ti.brand_name, ti.price, ti.gross_weight, ti.net_weight, ti.cont_no, ti.bargainno,ti.remark FROM t_transfer_order t LEFT JOIN t_transfer_order_item ti ON t.id = ti.transfer_order_id
order by t.id desc

select from t_transfer_order
order by t.id desc
